desc-string: Improve your combat skills, increase your combat attack power by 1%, and be able to wear level 1 equipment.
Improve your combat skills, increase your combat attack power by 1%, and be able to wear level 2 equipment.
Improve your combat skills, increase your combat attack power by 1%, and be able to wear level 3 equipment.

Improve your combat skills, increase your combat attack power by 1%, and be able to wear level 9 equipment.
Increase your critical hit rate against monsters by 5%/10%/15% by targeting their weak points.
Deliver a powerful ground pound attack in a small/medium/large radius, stunning all enemies around you for 2 seconds and dealing 50% weapon damage.
Unlocks the crafting recipe for the Scroll of Combat Gear 1
The probability of doubling the quantity of farming products harvested will increase by 1%.
The probability of doubling the quantity of farming products harvested will increase by 1%.
The probability of doubling the quantity of farming products harvested will increase by 1%. Grade 2 crops can be planted.

Increase the swing speed of the hoe.
Increase the watering speed.
Increase the probability of acquiring additional resources by 1%.
Increase the probability of acquiring additional resources by 1%.
Increase the probability of acquiring additional resources by 1%. Cause higher damage to level 2 resources.

Increase the speed of the axe.
Increases the critical hit rate when dealing damage to trees.
Unlocks the crafting recipe for the Scroll of Combat Gear 2
Unlocks the crafting recipe for the Scroll of Combat Gear 3
Unlocks the crafting recipe for the Scroll of Farming Gear 1

Waters small/medium/large fields around you.
Tear apart the ground ahead, and perform a hoeing of farmland within a short/medium/long range.
Carefully harvest crops, there is a 5%/10%/15% chance to get crop seeds.
Your movement speed in the homeland gains an additional 10%/20%/30% bonus.
Learn additional food recipes.
Unlocks level 1/2/3 fertilizer recipes.
Learn the method of recycling seeds from 3/6/9 kinds of crops.
Increases critical hit damage by 10%/20%/30%.
Increases movement speed by 10%/20%/30%.
Every 20/10/5 seconds, if you haven't taken any damage, you gain a 10% damage boost.
Charge forward, knocking back enemies along the way and dealing 50%/100%/150% weapon damage.
Grants 2%/4%/6% dodge rate.
Grants 0.1%/0.3%/0.5% damage boost for every 1% of missing health.
Unlocks 0/1/2 levels of combat potion recipes.
Increases attack speed by 10%/20%/30%.
Attacks have a 5%/10%/15% chance to trigger a level 3 War Trampling.
Performs 5/10/15 attacks against enemies in a small/medium/large radius around you, targeting random enemies with each attack.
Vigorously swing the ax in your hand to produce a small/medium/large range of air blade attacks, causing damage to trees within the range.
The chance of doubling the wood drop is increased by 3%/6%/9%.
Increase tree cutting damage by 10%/20%/30%.
Increase mining damage by 10%/20%/30%.
Increases the speed of swinging a pickaxe by 10%/20%/30%.
The chance of doubling the ore drop is increased by 3%/6%/9%.
Mining crit chance increased by 5%/10%/15%.
Quickly shakes the ground, releasing seismic waves in a small/medium/large area ahead, causing damage to ores within the area.
The weapon's attack leaves wounds, dealing 1%/2%/3% attack damage every 0.5 seconds for 5 seconds, and can stack up to 5 layers.
Striking the target's weak point, causing the target to receive an additional 1%/2%/3% damage for the next 5 seconds, and can stack up to 5 layers.
